body:
Here are the files, the zone construction components are grouped in a box with a blue background. I'm having an additional problem that happened after closing and opening the file, I can't create a custom EP construction, I get this error" 1. layer_1 is not a valid material name/definition. Create the material first and try again."

The custom EP construction components were ok until I re-opened the file. I grouped them in a box with a bright orange color.
